# automatic

**Type Property**

The automatic alternating row background behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
static let automatic: AlternatingRowBackgroundBehavior
```

## Discussion

This defers to default component behavior for alternating row backgrounds. Some components, such as `Table` on macOS, will default to having alternating row backgrounds; while List does not.

## Getting alternating row background behavior

- **enabled**: Alternating rows will be enabled for applicable views.
- **disabled**: Alternating rows will be disabled for applicable views.

items.description: Alternating rows will be enabled for applicable views.
items.name: enabled

items.description: Alternating rows will be disabled for applicable views.
